name: Roll Control (itch)
description:
In this mysterious dimension, you sit atop a game board, magically transformed into a die. As you try to escape, chess pieces attack you. In this dimension, everything runs on a cycle, like a turn-based game: after you make your move, the enemies will make theirs. In order to get more powerful, you must unlock all six faces of your die, unleashing a variety of attack, movement, and protection abilities. But make sure to watch out, there is one unlock-able face that does more harm than good. Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

C - Progress Text
